thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: China Pushes Back on Possible U.S. Metals-Import Limits

author: Wayne Ma
title: China Pushes Back on Possible U.S. Metals-Import Limits
text:
BEIJING—China hit back at the U.S. a day after the Trump administration said it would consider sweeping new limits on imports of steel and aluminum, measures that could affect Chinese exporters in particular and cause a trade war.
In an online statement posted Saturday, an official at China’s Ministry of Commerce said Beijing would “take necessary measures to safeguard its legitimate rights” if the U.S. pushed ahead with measures that hurt Chinese interests.
...
